alert.note: Alert for Baker; Brooks; Colquitt; Decatur; Early; Grady; Lowndes; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 13 at 11:19AM EDT until April 13 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 133 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS COLQUITT LOWNDES THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADAMS BEACH, ALMA, ATHENA, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BETHEL, BLAKELY, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYD, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, CUBA, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOUGLASVILLE, DRIFTON, EARLY CO A/P, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, GRADY CO A/P, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HAWKINSTOWN, HILLIARDVILLE, HOGGARD MILL, HOPEWELL, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOVETT, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NEWTON, PASCO, PELHAM, PERRY, PINE PARK, PINETTA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SOPCHOPPY, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEST BAINBRIDGE, AND WETUMPKA.
